posts.content:
my interior was getting a bit tired , the bed was loose and the floor was nasty so i decided to start again , then time and the inability to find a source of teak dictated a freshen up was on the cards instead of a rebuild .
so in went a new solid wood oak floor - ouch!! lol but worth it as ive wanted it for soo long lol







then i redid the rock and roll bed making it stiffer with new base in 18mm plywood , which will be covered in carpet or simelar soon ,







all of the interior was built out of teak that was found in the SKIP at my old work place the cupboard has lots of compartments for storage ,

the stereo is a pioneer headunit with two amplifeirs and a set of VIBE components up front with Vibe 6*9s at the rear , they give great budget sound so thats cool

thats all for now untill after the weekend coming when it will all get ripped out !!!! and remade to enlarge the cupboard and give the whole lot a new 117 layer varnish job a superyacht would be proud of!! lol
ohh and this is me standing in the pouring rain having teh pics taken lol
